title: PBE/Error 500?

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body: So I've been seeing a lot of "Error: 500 Something's gone hextechnically wrong." problems and on all of them there aren't any working solutions. This happens whenever I go to the PBE signup page but to my knowledge that's the only one. Also hi! Thanks and have a good day/night!

replies.body:
This typically happens if there's a routing issue with your connection to that page. You should be able to resolve it by using a Virtual Private Network (VPN) such as [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) or [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/).

Let me know if this worked for you!
This just worked for me.. kinda weird that we need a vpn for it
